---
title: "Publications"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| eval: false

library(rorcid)
library(dplyr)
b <- works("0000-0002-6265-6481")
pubs <- tibble(title = b$title.title.value, 
               year = b$`publication-date.year.value`,
               journal = b$`journal-title.value`,
               doi = b$url.value) |>
  arrange(desc(year))
save(pubs, file="pubs.rda")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#library(knitr)
#library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(glue)
library(gt)
load("pubs.rda")
pubs <- pubs |>
  mutate(titlelink = glue("[{title}]({doi})"))
#kable(pubs)
pubs |> 
  mutate(journal = if_else(is.na(journal), "ArXiv", journal)) |>
  select(titlelink, year, journal) |>
  rename(c("Title" = "titlelink",
           "Year" = "year",
           "Journal" = "journal")) |>
  gt() |>
  gt::fmt_markdown(columns = Title) |>
  gt::cols_width(Title ~ px(600),
                 Year ~ px(50),
                 Journal ~ px(200)) |>
  cols_align("left")
  
```
